title: Bug 3666 - Code Completion: Hungry code assist
description: Under certain circumstances, code assist eats too much code. In the given example class, the programmer needs to add a parameter to the `baz` call in `bar` to make the program correct.
SR:
1. Change the `baz` call to

```java
baz(x.x.foo())
```

2. Place the cursor after the first "x." in the modified `baz` call.
3. Press `Ctrl + Space` to bring up code assist.
4. Type "f" to filter the list.
5. Select "foo()" from the code assist list.
6. Observe the behavior.
